name: Chivalroots (GGJ23)
description:
Chivalroots is our creation for the Global Game Jam 2023. The game was created within a tight time limit of 48 hours with the given theme by two people. It is a simple tower-defense-ish gardening game.

The version offered here includes the fixes for obvious bugs (mainly screen resolution issues), some additional sound effects and a functional high score board.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move and Spacebar to attack. Use mouse to make and place purchases when in shop mode.
